title: Naivistic condensed geometric with forked g
content:
This unusual – and almost vernacular-looking – typeface had been featured in a major poster campaign in Stockholm this week. Any clue? :)

Font: 

 Libel Suit 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111047/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DSC\_0114.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111047/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_0114.JPG) | 1.27 MB |
author: Birdseeding

comments.content: Thank you! You have to wonder sometimes how major ad agencies (like this one, the billboard space alone must have cost millions) source their fonts.
